function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Validation of model assumptions, sensitivity analysis, peer review","category":"Ensuring scientific accuracy and validity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide appropriate treatment and support for affected individuals, implement public health measures to address stigma and promote mental well-being","category":"Public health support and mental well-being","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement robust measurement tools for physical activity assessment, consider using multiple data sources for validation","category":"Data and measurement accuracy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide clear and unambiguous operational definitions for flourishing criteria, and ensure consistent interpretation of responses.","category":"Defining and interpreting criteria","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct reliability checks, inter-rater agreement assessments, and sensitivity analyses to evaluate the impact of operational definition variability.","category":"Data validation and reliability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Include all healthcare costs in the analysis to provide a comprehensive assessment of resource utilization","category":"Economic analysis and resource utilization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Include sickness benefit transfers in the analysis to capture the full economic impact of long-term absences","category":"Economic analysis and resource utilization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Verify the accuracy of the conversion tool and consider alternative methods for international cost comparison","category":"International cost comparison and accuracy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establish a clear ethical review process and oversight for questionnaire-based survey studies","category":"Ethical review and oversight","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use advanced anonymization techniques, such as differential privacy, to lower the risk of re-identification","category":"Data privacy and security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement clear consent processes and ensure participants understand the implications of implied consent","category":"Data collection and participant consent","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, provide protective equipment, and minimize physical contact during data collection.","category":"Data collection safety measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting a comprehensive analysis of register-based data with flourishing as a predictor","category":"Data analysis and prediction","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting economic impact assessments of mental health and well-being programs","category":"Economic impact assessment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparative analysis of economic outcomes in different healthcare systems","category":"Comparative healthcare system analysis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote a balance between hedonic and eudaimonic well-being","category":"Well-being promotion","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct prospective studies with randomized samples","category":"Randomized studies","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Validate predictive models with real-world data, consider additional factors influencing healthcare costs","category":"Model validation and healthcare costs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identifying and addressing modifiable predictors of health and disease, reducing healthcare costs","category":"Healthcare cost reduction","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhancing population levels of well-being, promoting psychological flourishing","category":"Population well-being promotion","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encourage responsible economic practices and international collaboration on public health measures.","category":"Responsible economic practices and collaboration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Invest in cybersecurity measures, data encryption, and regular security audits.","category":"Cybersecurity and data protection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strong authentication methods, encryption, and fraud detection technologies.","category":"Data authentication and fraud detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote healthy lifestyle choices and provide access to healthcare","category":"Health promotion and access","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide financial support for healthcare, improve access to affordable healthcare services","category":"Financial support for healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement policies and programs to address economic inequality and promote sustainable development","category":"Economic inequality and sustainable development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Diversification of supply chains and investment in domestic industries","category":"Supply chain diversification and domestic investment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improving access to healthcare, economic support for vulnerable populations","category":"Healthcare access and support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stimulus packages, economic recovery plans, investment in infrastructure","category":"Economic stimulus and infrastructure investment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integrate scientific advice into the decision-making process, prioritize evidence-based actions","category":"Scientific advice and evidence-based decision-making","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emphasize the potential of technology, promote innovation, and invest in digital infrastructure","category":"Technology promotion and investment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement comprehensive planning mechanisms at global, regional, national, and local levels","category":"Comprehensive planning at multiple levels","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote inclusivity and diversity in decision-making, implement policies to involve young people and women in initiatives","category":"Inclusivity and diversity in decision-making","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establishing and strengthening partnerships and collaboration across all levels of governance and sectors.","category":"Partnerships and collaboration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integrated and coordinated approach to achieving sdgs, considering their interdependencies.","category":"Integrated approach to SDGs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strengthening global cooperation, resource sharing, and support for developing countries.","category":"Global cooperation and support for developing countries","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improving infrastructure in slum areas, providing proper sanitation, water, and waste management, and increasing access to healthcare facilities.","category":"Infrastructure improvement in slum areas","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reducing greenhouse gas emissions, transitioning to renewable energy sources, and implementing climate adaptation strategies.","category":"Environmental sustainability and climate change","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investing in sustainable practices, promoting remote work, and implementing policies to maintain reduced emission levels.","category":"Sustainable practices and remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improving access to safe drinking water and sanitation systems, promoting hygiene practices","category":"Access to safe water and sanitation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Supporting job creation, income generation, and economic recovery initiatives","category":"Economic recovery and job support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effective policy coordination, sustainable recovery initiatives","category":"Policy coordination and sustainable recovery","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase healthcare capacity, implement safety measures, and provide support for healthcare workers","category":"Healthcare capacity and support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Invest in educational technology, provide internet access, and support teachers in delivering remote education","category":"Educational technology and remote education support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement measures to address climate change and protect the environment","category":"Climate change mitigation and environmental protection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase funding for public health infrastructure and facilities","category":"Public health infrastructure funding","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investment in education and healthcare infrastructure, community health programs","category":"Education and healthcare infrastructure investment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement sustainable production and consumption methods, promote responsible economy","category":"Sustainable production and consumption","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of public health measures and environmental
